body: Holy fucking shit...Yukari is savage as all hell in the name of love. She sell out Yuyuko and Youmu for MC to chained him to her even more than he already is, sell out her friends for thousands years to her beloved as his mistress but she still limit Yuyuko time with him, for he belong to Yukari( crazy obsession). And she has drugged him for a long time to make him forget everything about the Outside World and his former identity, she done everything she can to make him her forever: her body and her undying love, both of her Shikigami and now her lifelong best friend and her BFF servant....the plot in this series is completely insane, I love this even more now that I can understand it. Thank you Midori-sensei for showing us the crazy love of Touhou characters, remind us that they're Supernatural Beings/Youkai. They're not human and inherently evil and even more selfish than human can ever be.
I really hope the AM part will be translated soon.
damn the quality is good but its full censored... would've been nice without it
Chen saved the day or night i guess.
IT'S TRANSLATED!!! Thank you!!! Where's AM part though?
kinda feel bad for yuyuko, either way nice
ugh... the full censorship really hurts the mood, most of this artist works are yet to be translated and we got the end of the series. great story nonetheless
Finally some translation for amazing art. Thanks for sharing
